name: The Balmoral House

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent stay,good location,lots of leaflets and books, brochures.Very clean,super breakfast! Jim and Jane our hosts were very amiable and helpful.We would visit again and will recommend their place to anyone.The tv. lounge was nice even though their was a tv. in our room.The bar area was also comfortable and cosy.
reviews.title: happy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just had a very enjoyable 5 days stay with Jane and Jim, we were made to feel very welcome from the moment we arrived. Our room was very nice and spotlessly clean with excellent en suite facilities. The lounge is bright and comfortable, the breakfasts were amazing and nothing was too much trouble, the bar was well stocked and with a cosy and sociable seating area for a relaxing drink and chat with brilliant hosts. We will certainly be going back again and would highly recommend this B & B.
reviews.title: Perfect Choice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Alan & Pauline
reviews.title: brilliant hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: this is the 3rd time we have stayed here we went at the beginning of june for our belated honeymoon jane and jim are so welcoming nothings to much trouble their grandson jake was staying with them and he was so entertaining we loved every minute of our stay the rooms are spotless and the breakfasts are really filling keeps you going til tea time we will certainly recommend them to friends and family,thank you jane and jim.
reviews.title: Fantastic BnB Great Hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my fiance go to Bridlington the same time very year and decided to stay in Balmoral this year at the end of may 2012.
reviews.title: Wonderful place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The proprietors here give you a really genuine warm welcome. They're friendly without being intrusive and seem to really enjoy giving excellent service. We came with bikes, and they accomodated these in the back yard, carefully locking two gates between there and the road. The room was comfortable, just a little on the small side, but everything was clean and tidy. For £30pppn this was a really good deal.
reviews.title: Great welcome and great value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: my hubby and i very highly recommend jane and jims home to everyone, you were met with a very warm friendly welcoming, Room excellent, Looked forward to a full english breakfast each morning. As it was our first wedding anniversary our stay will always be treasured in many years to come..WE WILL DEFINATLEY BE RETURNING.
reviews.title: simply the best

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: many thanks to you both. love to alf and bailey x
reviews.title: Warm welcome for our mini family stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: My husband, myself (then 34 week pregnant) and our 4 year old boy stayed at the Balmoral House over the Royal Wedding bank holiday weekend for 2 nights. We came from Sheffield late that first night and were made to feel welcome from the start. Both Jane and Jim were friendly and full of advice and recommendations and the family room we had was very tidy and clean and well decorated. There was a double bed for us and a single bed for our boy. Despite being heavily pregnant I had no trouble getting up the stairs to the room. The breakfast was very good too. We had a very pleasant stay and would definitely recommend this B&B or use it again. It's centrally located therefore really handy.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent 5 nights here in July, comfortable and clean, great breakfast and helpfull friendly owners.
reviews.title: Couldn't Wish For A Better Place To Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Exceptional value for money. Balmoral is kept to a very high standard of cleanliness and décor in keeping with the property. The owners Jane and Jim were very friendly, but not at all overbearing, with exceptional local knowledge they were happy to share. There was a good variety of food and drinks for breakfast which was cooked to perfection, accommodating our dietary requirements. OOO not to forget the mattress was so comfortable with good quality pillows, something I always either miss when away from home is a good night's sleep.
reviews.title: Exceptional value for money.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of Balmoral is less than ten minutes flat walk to the seafront, for a very slow walker like myself. Lots of events going on to keep all ages entertained, even for people like us who prefer to take things a little easier. We will be back!! -
reviews.title: Loved it here.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you Jane and Jim, perfect hosts in the evening at the bar.
reviews.title: Warm and Welcoming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We visit Bridlington about twice a year and have tried quite a few guest houses but this is by far the best one yet.
reviews.title: Wonderful hosts, lovely rooms....it made our weekend!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spotlessly clean everywhere and even though the room we had was not that big it had everything we needed. The bed linen was beautiful and the towels soft and fluffy.
reviews.title: Excellent place to Stay.Wonderful Hosts.Great Premises.Very Friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: having just returened from our second vist to the balmoral we just feit we had to write and tell all what a wonderful time we have had. we recieved the same warm and friendly welcome as the first in fact we hardly felt like we had been away, as before the place was spotless the room bright and airey the service excellent with nothing to much trouble for our hosts jim and jane. they were a font of local knowledge and only to happy to share this. the food was superb and well presented. a big thank you to jim and jane for a wonderful weekend already planning our next vist hope to see you soon david &jackie
reviews.title: couldnt wish for better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an extemely clean and welcoming guest house with very friendly and helpful hosts. It is very near to bus station, beach etc.
reviews.title: Amazing...definitely recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would highly recommend this to couples as it was me and my husband that visited but we are going to book again and take our 11 and 13 year old and will write another review after that visit. All in all a fab experience with thanks to Jim and Jane.
reviews.title: Warm and welcoming...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed here for 5 days and wished it could have been longer. Friendly hosts and were made to feel at home the moment we walked in the door. Top marks for cleanliness which is lacking in quite a few places we have stayed in Brid in the past. Brekkie was the tops, fresh fruit salad most days and everything served with a smile. We liked being just round the corner from everything and didn't even have to use the car while we there. The hosts were full of ideas of things we could during our stay and recommendations of best places to eat out. Even got us a discount on our Spa tickets. A big thumbs up to Jim and Jane and can't wait to visit again.
reviews.title: Excellent stay in a lovely guest house with superb hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011
reviews.text: We received a lovely welcome on our arrival on the Friday. We were shown to our rooms ( and offered help with luggage) which had everything we needed, all spotlessly clean and a light airy nicely decorated bedroom. We hadn't ordered an evening meal and Jane and Jim were very helpful and gave us information about the local restaurants from their own personal experience and we had a very nice meal at Rags by the harbour.
reviews.title: A real oasis in the centre of Bridlington...

aka: The Balmoral House Bridlington, United Kingdom
description: A 4 star comfortable guest house with family, twin, double and single rooms available. We are just 300yds from the harbor and close to all shops and amenities. Relax with a drink before dinner in our well stocked bar, or maybe on the patio if the weathers fine. What ever you choose to do you will be made to feel welcome.We also have a lovely residents lounge.
